text: This subchapter shall not be exclusive. Partnerships may merge or engage in interest exchanges in any other manner provided or permitted by law.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 41-159.9.

2001 Ed., § 33-109.09.

Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on § 909 of the Uniform Partnership Act (1997 Act). See Vol. 6, Part I , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 29-609.06

Current through December 11, 2012
